name: BlueSky
details:
ReverberatorStudio-quality Plate, Room, and Spring Reverb from a Pedal
Lush, Majestic Reverbs. Insane DSP Power

Plate, room, and spring reverb to meet all your stage and studio needs
Standard Decay (size) and Pre-delay (onset time) controls for fast tweaks
High and low damping controls darkness/brightness
Mix knob lets you control dry/wet signal
Modulation mode adds phase-y textures to reverbs
Shimmer mode adds endless sustain to chords and leads
Favorite switch lets you save and recall your go-to reverb
Stereo ins and outs for primo stage and studio sounds
Adjustable ±3dB control keeps your clean and FX levels consistent
Onboard SHARC DSP (the same used by UAD) for powerful processing
24-bit/96kHZ A/D/A conversion
True bypass switching keeps the blueSky from sucking tone when disengaged

http://www.strymon.net/bluesky/
